cards.title: B'yrg's Nail
body: The first time this card enters play, select a player. Treat this card as part of their deck for the rest of the game.
When this card enters play, a hero from its deck deals the 3 targets with the lowest HP 3 melee damage each. Then move this card beneath the top 2 cards of its deck face down.
cards.flavorText: Titan considered the worn inscription{BR}on the statue before breaking one of{BR}its stone swords free.“Just going to{BR}borrow this. Don't tell anyone.”

cards.title: Deeper into the Vault
body: When this card enters play, reveal the top {H} cards of the environment deck. Put any Artifact cards revealed into play and discard the other revealed cards.
Increase all psychic damage dealt by 1.
cards.flavorText: There were rumors that the Ministry's{BR}Archive was located over even deeper,{BR}more ancient caverns, but no one was{BR}particularly eager to find out.

cards.title: Director Wells
body: Play this next to the hero with the lowest HP. That hero is immune to psychic damage.
Players with Artifact cards in their hand cannot draw cards.
cards.flavorText: “He's back”, said the director, tapping{BR}idly on his desk. “He seeks to finish what{BR}he started that night. But without the{BR}stone, who knows what he'll try.”

cards.title: Forbidden Knowledge
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals 1 hero 2 infernal damage. A hero dealt damage this way may draw 1 card.
At the end of each hero's turn, if they have an Artifact card in their hand, this card deals that hero 2 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: A whisper floated through the endless{BR}shelves: “You seek truth?” It came from{BR}everywhere at once; a harsh, skeletal{BR}noise. “You are not equipped for truth.”

cards.title: Map to Lost Choth
body: The first time this card enters play, select a player. Treat this card as part of their deck for the rest of the game.
When this card enters play, 1 player discards a card, a second player plays a card, and a third player’s hero uses a power. Then move this card beneath the top 2 cards of its deck face down.
cards.flavorText: Terminus closed her eyes. Visions of the{BR}city came clearly, along with the smell{BR}of salt and iron, and the sense of{BR}something waiting for her in the dark.

cards.title: Moment of Sanity
body: When this card enters play, destroy {H - 2} ongoing cards.
Heroes gain the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] Discard 1 Artifact card. If you do, play a card or destroy 1 environment card. Then destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “Sorry, sword, but I have a policy. No{BR}mental subjugation on the first date.”{BR}With that, Titan hurled the stone weapon{BR}out into the black waters.

cards.title: Pelaga
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each target from the hero deck with the most Artifacts 3 toxic damage.
Whenever this card is dealt damage by a hero target, that hero must discard 1 non-Artifact card.
cards.flavorText: “This is your fate when the Crown tires{BR}of you!” shrieked the monster. “Fishy,”{BR}said Titan, “every time we let you out,{BR}you try to digest someone.”

cards.title: Phoebe Nelson
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each villain target 1 fire damage and each hero with an Artifact card in their hand 1 fire damage.
Whenever an Artifact card enters play, this card deals itself 2 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: “Another Friday night wasted,” she said,{BR}brushing away cobwebs. A fiery outline{BR}formed over her hand, illuminating the{BR}hall. “After you, big guy.”

cards.title: Shattered Display Case
body: Whenever a target is destroyed, discard the top card of the environment deck. If an Artifact card is discarded this way, put it into play and destroy this card.
At the end of the environment turn, place all Artifact cards in all trash piles on top of their respective decks.
cards.flavorText: “I have a job to do,” said Phase, picking{BR}up the carved tablet from the shattered{BR}glass. “Now pardon me. I'm leaving your{BR}creepy basement.”

cards.title: Sig-Quil's Sign
body: The first time this card enters play, select a player. Treat this card as part of their deck for the rest of the game.
When this card enters play, increase damage dealt to and by targets from its deck by 1 until the start of their next turn. Then move this card beneath the top 2 cards of its deck face down.
cards.flavorText: “Vault Five is where they stick the{BR}unhealthy stuff. Things no sane person{BR}should see,” said Agent Nelson. “That's{BR}why they're sending us to sort this out.”

cards.title: The Ancients Stir
body: Whenever an Artifact card enters play, increase damage dealt by this card by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the target with the second-highest HP 1 infernal damage.
cards.flavorText: The crystal spun indecisively, as if it{BR}could not discern where the danger lay.{BR}Or perhaps, the danger was everywhere.{BR}Neither thought was comforting.

cards.title: The Coin That Strays
body: The first time this card enters play, select a player. Treat this card as part of their deck for the rest of the game.
When this card enters play, a hero from its deck deals themselves and 1 other target 1 psychic damage each and plays a card. Then move this card beneath the top 2 cards of its deck face down.
cards.flavorText: Staring at the coin was strangely{BR}unpleasant; Malichae blinked to clear his{BR}head. Then he realized the coin was now{BR}on top of its case rather than inside it.

cards.title: The Eye of Fomirhet
body: The first time this card enters play, select a player. Treat this card as part of their deck for the rest of the game.
When this card enters play, a hero from its deck regains 4HP and deals each other hero target 1 infernal damage. Then move this card beneath the top 2 cards of its deck face down.
cards.flavorText: “Fomirhet, Who Burns. Class five entity.{BR}Extremely dangerous,” Wells said. Titan{BR}grimaced at the old man. “So why do{BR}you have its eye?”

cards.title: The Outer Music
body: At the end of the environment turn, each hero target deals itself 1 psychic damage.
When a player plays an Artifact card from their hand, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Cricket listened for echoes, trying to{BR}measure the cavern's depth. “This can't{BR}be right,” she said to Baccarat. “There's{BR}no other side. It just keeps going.”

cards.title: The Rats in the Walls
body: When this card enters play, it deals each target 1 psychic damage.
Whenever a player draws an Artifact card, they may draw a card.
Increase damage dealt to heroes with Artifact cards in their hands by 1.
cards.flavorText: Expatriette continued bashing apart the{BR}plaster walls, exposing the slick cave{BR}rock beneath. “How can you not hear{BR}them? They're all around us!”
